name: BonBabSetupBase
brief:
Base configuration class for branch-and-bound MINLP solvers

Aggregates all components needed to run branch-and-bound: NLP solver,
cut generators, heuristics, branching rules, and tree traversal strategy.
Serves as the central configuration point for Bonmin algorithms.

**Key components:**
- nonlinearSolver_: OsiTMINLPInterface for NLP subproblems
- cutGenerators_: List of CglCutGenerator (OA, ECP, Gomory, etc.)
- heuristics_: List of CbcHeuristic (feasibility pump, rounding, etc.)
- branchingMethod_: OsiChooseVariable for variable selection

**Tree search strategies:**
- NodeComparison: bestBound, DFS, BFS, dynamic, bestGuess
- TreeTraversal: HeapOnly, DiveFromBest, ProbedDive, DfsDiveFromBest

**Branching strategies (VarSelectStra_Enum):**
- MOST_FRACTIONAL: Simple, fast, often poor
- STRONG_BRANCHING: Evaluate candidates via LP/NLP solves
- RELIABILITY_BRANCHING: Use pseudo-costs when trusted

algorithms.name:
Branch-and-Bound for MINLP:
Systematic enumeration via tree search with NLP relaxations at nodes.
At each node: solve continuous relaxation, branch on fractional integer
variable if not integer-feasible, prune if relaxation bound ≥ incumbent.
algorithms.math:
Node selection affects convergence rate:
- Best-bound: Select node with lowest relaxation value (best global bound)
- Depth-first: Minimize memory, find feasible solutions quickly
- Best-estimate: Use pseudo-costs to estimate integer solution quality
Hybrid strategies (DiveFromBest) combine: dive from best-bound node
until leaf, then return to best remaining node.
algorithms.complexity:
O(2^m) worst case where m = number of binary variables.
In practice, pruning via bounds and cuts dramatically reduces tree size.
Strong branching: O(k · NLP) per node where k = candidates evaluated.
ref:
Belotti et al. (2013). "Mixed-integer nonlinear optimization".
  Acta Numerica 22:1-131. [Comprehensive MINLP survey]

Achterberg, Koch & Martin (2005). "Branching rules revisited".
  Operations Research Letters 33(1):42-54. [Branching strategies]

see: BonminSetup for the concrete Bonmin configuration
CbcBonmin for the main branch-and-bound driver
